What a state this is.\""},{"lineNumber":40776,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは飢えた民衆に荷台から引きずり下ろされ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance was pulled down from the wagon by the starving crowd,"},{"lineNumber":40777,"originalJapaneseLine":"積み荷が奪い合いになる様を呆然と眺めていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and watched in daze as the cargo was fought over."},{"lineNumber":40778,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大丈夫、ランス？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you okay, Rance?\""},{"lineNumber":40779,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆さん、苦しんでらしたんですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone has been suffering, haven’t they...\""},{"lineNumber":40780,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ですが……危険ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... this is dangerous.\""},{"lineNumber":40781,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes?\""},{"lineNumber":40782,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぐっ……！　く、苦しい……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...! It's, it hurts...!\""},{"lineNumber":40783,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がふっ、げほっ……！　ぐ、ぐぐぐ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah, cough...! G-guh...!\""},{"lineNumber":40784,"originalJapaneseLine":"突然、届けられた食料をその場で貪っていた人々が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, those devouring the delivered food on the spot,"},{"lineNumber":40785,"originalJapaneseLine":"腹を押さえて苦しみ始めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"clutched their stomachs and began to suffer."},{"lineNumber":40786,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なに、なに！？　まさか、毒……！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what, what!? Could it be poison...!?\""},{"lineNumber":40787,"originalJapaneseLine":"「バッ……そんな馬鹿な！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no way... that’s absurd!\""},{"lineNumber":40788,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうではない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That's not it."},{"lineNumber":40789,"originalJapaneseLine":"　飢餓状態で急に固形物を腹に入れたせいで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Because they suddenly put solid food into their stomachs while in a starving state,"},{"lineNumber":40790,"originalJapaneseLine":"　胃をやられたのだ。最悪死ぬぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"their stomachs were damaged. They could even die in the worst case.\""},{"lineNumber":40791,"originalJapaneseLine":"「少し回って、腹ごなしの魔法を掛けてきます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll go around a bit and cast a digestion-aiding spell.\""},{"lineNumber":40792,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、わ、私も……構いませんか、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I will too... Is that alright, Lord Rance?\""},{"lineNumber":40793,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、やってやれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, go ahead.\""},{"lineNumber":40794,"originalJapaneseLine":"神魔法の心得のある面々が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Those skilled in divine magic,"},{"lineNumber":40795,"originalJapaneseLine":"急いで民衆へと駆けていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"hurried toward the crowd."},{"lineNumber":40796,"originalJapaneseLine":"「す、すぐに食べちゃダメーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-don't eat it immediatelyーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":40797,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、ううう、うるせえ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-ughh, shut up!"},{"lineNumber":40798,"originalJapaneseLine":"　く、食い物が目の前にあるのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"F-food is right in front of me,"},{"lineNumber":40799,"originalJapaneseLine":"　食わずにいられるか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"how can I possibly not eat it!\""},{ "lineNumber":40800, "originalJapaneseLine":"「落ち着いて下さい、落ち着いて……", "translatedEnglishLine":"\"Calm down, please calm down...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山道は下りにさしかかっていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mountain path began to slope downward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 平和な旅路を象徴するように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if symbolizing a peaceful journey,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: のんびりとうしが鳴いた。
更に進むこと、数日。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After traveling further for several days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道行きの向こうを、シィルが見晴らした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seere looked out ahead along the road.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様、街に着きますよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance, we're about to reach the town."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ……やっと到着か」
ゼス東部、ダグザス――
テープを抜け、徐々に北上した一団は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The group, having passed through Tape, gradually headed north,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中規模の都市へと入っていった。
街は、静まりかえっていた。
まばらに見える人は歩く姿も鈍重で生気が無く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The few people visible walked sluggishly and without vitality,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死者のようでさえあった。
「食料を持ってきたぞーーーーーー！！」
先頭の男が上げた声は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The voice of the man at the front,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一拍置いて……直後、都市中を揺るがした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: after a beat... immediately shook the entire city.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、お、おおおおおおおーーーーー！！
め、め、メシだ！　食い物だ！」
「こっちに頂戴！　子供がお腹を空かせてるの！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Give it here! The children are hungry!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うおおっ！？」
「おい押すなよ！　もう一週間近く、水しか……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, don’t push! We've had nothing but water for nearly a week...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんなそうだよ、バカ野郎！
さっさと退け！！」
「…………うっは。なんつー状態だ」
ランスは飢えた民衆に荷台から引きずり下ろされ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance was pulled down from the wagon by the starving crowd,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 積み荷が奪い合いになる様を呆然と眺めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and watched in daze as the cargo was fought over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大丈夫、ランス？」
「皆さん、苦しんでらしたんですね……」
「ですが……危険ですね」
「はい？」
「うぐっ……！　く、苦しい……！」
「がふっ、げほっ……！　ぐ、ぐぐぐ……！」
突然、届けられた食料をその場で貪っていた人々が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, those devouring the delivered food on the spot,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腹を押さえて苦しみ始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: clutched their stomachs and began to suffer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なに、なに！？　まさか、毒……！？」
「バッ……そんな馬鹿な！」
「……そうではない。
飢餓状態で急に固形物を腹に入れたせいで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because they suddenly put solid food into their stomachs while in a starving state,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 胃をやられたのだ。最悪死ぬぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: their stomachs were damaged. They could even die in the worst case."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「少し回って、腹ごなしの魔法を掛けてきます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll go around a bit and cast a digestion-aiding spell."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、わ、私も……構いませんか、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I will too... Is that alright, Lord Rance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、やってやれ」
神魔法の心得のある面々が、
急いで民衆へと駆けていった。
「す、すぐに食べちゃダメーーー！」
「う、ううう、うるせえ！
く、食い物が目の前にあるのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: F-food is right in front of me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食わずにいられるか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how can I possibly not eat it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「落ち着いて下さい、落ち着いて……

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I will too... Is that alright, Lord Rance?"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: F-food is right in front of me,
